content.text:
# Golden Horse Award for Best Original Screenplay

}}
The Golden Horse Award for Best Original Screenplay () is presented annually at the Taipei Golden Horse Film Awards.
It was first awarded in 1962 as Best Screenplay. Starting from the 16th Golden Horse Awards in 1979, it was split into two separate categories, the other being Golden Horse Award for Best Adapted Screenplay.
